column5: Had a great family trip to the Kawathas. Have not been back to Pigeon in a few years and was happy I did. Landed my first 50" fish in a few years at good old DSI!      Great time for sure!
Not sure which mug is uglier...  Great stuff Jamie... glad DSI was good to you again!
Wow nice ski
Good to see ya here Jamie congrats on the 50" if I did not know you any better I would say you look happy
Nice catch that's a monster.
DSI eh? Clean off your shoes. WTG Jamie.

Hey, I have a DSi too! I really only use it for Solitaire while on the toilet...  Nice fish! Man, I'd love to get something huge like that sometime. I'd be afraid it may ruin me for bass fishing, though.. But I'd still like to! Congrats!
Good to see you back in the game Bud, that's a beautiful fish !!  You shoulda let me know you were in the area and I would have met up with you guys over there.  You still around ??
Nice ski Jamie.  We miss that smile around here bud
Nice Muskie 50 is my next goal too. Congrats  Paul

Very nice nice, My bigest is 46" out of a canoe in a river I'm still hoping for a 48"er or so but my smile will be as big as yours if or when I get a 50"er, hey that means I need to plan my 1st Musky trip of the year TOO lol Bass 1st Congrats SBK
Great catch and sweet picks...
Sweet fish Jamie !!!  Thanks for sharing.
BIG FISH  AMAZING
Good to see yer still poking around Jamie! Nice fish indeed!
Awesome fish bud    Congrats

A 50 incher is a rare feat but more so in the Kawarthas. After about 25 yrs. i am still searching for a 50 incher on Pigeon maybe i need to know where this D.S.I is located?  Nice going there Crazyhook.
Nice Muskie Jamie. You will have to show me where DSI is this summer.

Wow! What a beautiful fish...you must still be smiling.  I HAVE to go and target muskie soon. After 20+ years of fishing bass and walleye I hate to admit it but I've never caught a muskie. Yep, never. I see a fish like that and I think it's time I get some basic muskie tackle and lake tips from some of the masters on the forum.  Congrats again.  Dave
nice ski congrats
AHHHHHHH DSI, a haven for people, animals and Cottonelle.
Now that right there is HILARIOUS!!!!  Nice fish Jamie! It was nice hooking up with you while you were here!!  s.
